mapper.insert: insert into GASELECTEDMPSNO (MPSNO, C_DATE) values (#{mpsno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select MPS.mpsno as "mpsno", (select codename from ldcode where codetype='knowledge' and code=rtrim(TYPE)) as "type", taskno as "taskno", processfileno as "processfileno", manunumber as "manunumber", startdate as "startdate", enddate as "enddate", department as "department", status as "status" from MPS,GASelectedMPSNo where MPS.mpsno=GASelectedMPSNo.mpsno order by enddate
